Name: aar-sheikhmahmoudab
Author: Sheikh Mahmoud Abdel Qader Hamz And Group Of Scholars

Translations.Text: Nabiyow kitab marak (yahuud kee Nasaara kinnuk) cakki Akke waytek sinni diinit Yalli madqe weem edde osissaanamal caddok matatrina, siinik duma Nummah isih makkooteeh Seehadak maggo mara makkoyseeh sinnih massa- le gitak makkoote marih Nafsî fayxiixa makataatina keenik ixxic
Israa-iil xaylok koroosite mari Nabii Daawuud Arrabaay Maryam baxa Nabii Qiisah Arrabat abbarsimeh, woh kah keenit tekkem Yallih Amrih cinaa kee umaanet caddok taturak Sugeenimih Sabbata
Tama yahuud sittak table umaaney abtak itta waasak masuginna usun abak Sugeenim manxu Qaxumaa

Nabiyow keenik (yahuud kinnuk) maggo mari koroosite mara Awlaytiitih haysitah ken table, usun Sinni Nafsih taamoomik tatruseenim manxu Qaxumaa! Yalli ken edde yanqibeemit asen waqdi, usun Qhiyaamah Ayró Yallih digaalal waare-lon
Tama yahuud Yallaa kee kay Nabii Mucammad kee Qhuraanak kaal obsimtem Nummaysinnoonuy Ama koros Awlaytiitih haysitak manannon, kinnih immay keenik maggo mari Yallih Amri cineeh kay taaqatak yewqeh

Nabiyow Sinaamak Yallaa kee koo Nummayse marah Qadaawatah gidibuk Raqtam yahuud kee Yallat Agleytit haa mara kinnim keenik geetto, diggah Nabiyow yeemeneh yan marah kacanuh xayuk Raaqa mari diggah nanu Nasaara iyye mara kinnim keenik geetto, woh kah kinnim diggah keenik isi diinih ixxiga le maraa kee Qibaada keenik Abita mari keenit yaniimi, diggah usun cakkik makaxxa mariinitan
